appName.description: The name (maximum of 45 characters) is the primary identifier of the extension and is a required field. (Install dialog, Extension management UI, Chrome Web Store)

appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the extensions name. (App launcher, New Tab page)

appDesc.message: Organize and track your favorite recipes!
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.
